body_html:
I managed to reproduce it with pytorch compiled from master today.
Actually, it's not limited to dropout, but other functions give the same behavior as well (relu, sigmoid), and the -O flag is enough to make it segfault.
body_text:
I managed to reproduce it with pytorch compiled from master today.
Actually, it's not limited to dropout, but other functions give the same behavior as well (relu, sigmoid), and the -O flag is enough to make it segfault.
body:
I managed to reproduce it with pytorch compiled from master today.
Actually, it's not limited to `dropout`, but other functions give the same behavior as well (`relu`, `sigmoid`), and the `-O` flag is enough to make it segfault.
